mapper.select: /* 상품 코드별 정보 조회 */ SELECT goods_refurb_code , seller_store_num , goods_large_code , goods_small_code , member_id , goods_large_cate , goods_small_cate , goods_refurb_name , goods_nomal_price , goods_refurb_price , goods_refurb_count , goods_refurb_harvest_date , goods_refurb_organic , goods_refurb_img , goods_post_explain , goods_refurb_sell_state , entry_time FROM goods_management WHERE goods_refurb_code = #{goodsRefurbCode};

/* 상품 목록 조회 */ SELECT m.goods_refurb_code , m.seller_store_num , m.goods_large_code , m.goods_small_code , m.member_id , m.goods_large_cate , m.goods_small_cate , m.goods_refurb_name , m.goods_nomal_price , m.goods_refurb_price , m.goods_refurb_count , m.goods_refurb_harvest_date , m.goods_refurb_organic , m.goods_refurb_img , m.goods_post_explain , m.goods_refurb_sell_state , m.entry_time , s.goods_small_name , l.goods_large_name FROM goods_management AS m INNER JOIN goods_small AS s ON m.goods_small_cate = s.goods_small_cate INNER JOIN goods_large AS l ON m.goods_large_cate = l.goods_large_cate

/* 상품 카테고리 목록 조회 */ SELECT l.goods_large_cate , s.goods_small_cate , l.goods_large_name , s.goods_small_name , s.last_update_time , s.entry_time FROM goods_large AS l INNER JOIN goods_small AS s ON l.goods_large_cate = s.goods_large_cate;

/* 소분류 카테고리별 정보 조회 */ SELECT goods_small_cate , goods_large_cate , member_id , update_manager_id , goods_small_name , entry_time , last_update_time FROM goods_small WHERE goods_small_cate = #{goodsSmallCate};
